name: Starot
description:
Starot is a Tarot inspired 2D pixel art game which we made for the htk Game Jam.

 

Game Features:

  • Follow the character across the stars and defeat your opponents in a tactical card game.
  • Collect up to 12 Beast cards while you fight against the 22 major arcane tarots.
  • Discover the map with a simple gameplay. Perfect for having uncomplicated fun.

Have fun and enjoy our game!

Creators: 

Programmer & Art Director – Marvin Wardius  Concept Art, Main Sound & Main Director - Nicole Krause 2D Artist, Cards - Elaha Taraky 2D Artist, UI, UI Animation - Jonas Wein 2D Artist, Cards, Character Design - Karyna Honhalo 2D Artist, Cards, Animations - Mia Ayleen Harder
